forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
